Lectures.Title: L1: 600 Ship Navy
Lectures.Description: The lecture talked about the idea of a 600 Ship Navy

Lectures.Title: L2: USS Barb
Lectures.Description: This lecture focused on USS Barb, the only submarine to successfully sink a train.

Lectures.Title: L3: WW2
Lectures.Description: The lecture went over World War 2 and what the Navy did during that time.

Lectures.Title: L4: Midway
Lectures.Description: The lecture went over the Battle of Midway.

Lectures.Title: L5: The Missile Age
Lectures.Description: This lecture talked about how naval combat has changed now that ships focus more on missiles than guns.

Labs.Title: Lab 1: Find a Hero
Labs.Description: Lab 1 was about finding a Medal of Honor recipient and writing about what they did.

Labs.Title: Lab 2: Battleship
Labs.Description: Lab 2 was a giant game of battleship with the students commanding their ships.
